Package org.apache.storm.streams.processors

Class ChainedProcessorContext<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.storm.streams.processors.ChainedProcessorContext<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, ProcessorContext<T>
    public class ChainedProcessorContext<T>
extends Object
implements ProcessorContext<T>
    A composite context that holds a chain of ProcessorContext.
    See Also:
